constituent: carp, fish, bound up, rice field, brains, oven-fire, barbecue, computer
heisigStory: These are the same carp you see in Japanese "carp streamers." Only here we find a small home computer or two strung on the line by a father anxious for his son not only to have the courage and determination of a carp swimming upstream, but also the efficiency and memory of a computer. Ugh.
koohiiStory1: Japanese carp are massive fish - they are measured in ri!
koohiiStory2: The fish got carpal tunnel syndrome from the computer(I know it´s lame but it´s hard to find a good story for this).
